member.name: T:ThoughtWorks.CruiseControl.WebDashboard.Dashboard.GenericPlugins.HtmlReportPlugin
member.title: HTML Report Plugin
member.summary: A generic plug-in to display a report from an HTML file.

remarks.heading: HTML Source Location
remarks.para: This plug-in can display any file that is in the build folder under artefacts folder for the project. It cannot display files from any other location (for security reasons).
Files can be published to a build folder using the File Merge Task. This will automatically generate the correct folder structure for the HTML reports.
remarks.heading: File Names
remarks.para: All file names are relative to the build folder. Files directly in the folder can be specified, as well as folders in sub-folders. For example both report.html and documents\report.html are valid file names.
Absolute filepaths are not allowed (e.g. c:\somewhere\report.html).
If the project's artefact folder was d:\data\ and the build label was 1.0.1, then report.html would come from d:\data\1.0.1\report.html.
